content.question: IfÂ <math alttext="log subscript 8 c equals 4"><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>8</mn></msub><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>, which of the following must be true?

choices.label: <math alttext="4 to the power of 8 equals c"><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>8</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi></math>
<math alttext="4 to the power of c equals 8"><msup><mn>4</mn><mi>c</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math>
<math alttext="8 to the power of c equals 4"><msup><mn>8</mn><mi>c</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>
<math alttext="8 to the power of 4 equals c"><msup><mn>8</mn><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="8 to the power of 4 equals c"><msup><mn>8</mn><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
